system.requirements: The Character has a Minion of Chaos (Lesser, Standard, or Greater), and someone with the Pskyer Trait to perform the Ritual. The ritual is performed somewhere quiet and isolated from others (if not, -20 to test). Psyker makes Lore Test, if passed, Character makes Opposed WP Test vs Minion's WP, with +10 per DoS on Psyker's Test. Test is modified by Summoning Ritual Modifiers.
system.effect: Minion is bound to the character permenantly, character can see through minion's eyes and vice versa, both can use the perception-based skills, talents, and traits of the other. Has range limit of 2d10km, May be blocked only by Psychic Wards unless character makes -20 WP Test. In combat, neither is suprised if the other isn't. Minion auto-passes Loyalty Tests, if minion is killed, Character makes -30 WP Test or suffer 2d10 Permenant WP Damage.
system.costs: All Participants gain Toguhness Bonus Fatigue and fall unconcious for 1d5 Hours. Once awoken, recovering from fatigue takes 4x longer than usual.
system.failure: Psyker makes -40 Willpower Test or can't use Psychic Powers for 1d5 Days. Character makes -20 Toughness Test or left unconcious for 1d5 hours, blind for 1d5 days, and suffers 1d10 wounds that ignore armour/toughness. Minion makes +0 Toughness Test, with -10 per DoF on Lore test, if failed, they die.
